Text

“ [I]2343-i can not fix on the hour , or the spot , or the look , or the words , which laid the foundation . It is too long ago . [I]113-lager was in the middle before [I]113-lager knew that [I]113-lager had begun . ”[113-lager]

— [Jane Austen]85-jane austen ’s Pride and Prejudice

April 2 , [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn

It is a truth universally acknowledged that [I]113-lager am something of a badass .

For starters , [I]113-lager live in [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn , where [everyone]344-everyone can more or less handle [herself]345-herself . [I]113-lager drink [my]113-lager coffee black . And [I]113-lager work with [professional athletes]346-professional athletes , holding [my]113-lager own in [an office]347-an office so full of testosterone that caffeine is almost beside the point .

[I]113-lager can do twenty - five push - ups in a set . Last year [a hockey player]348-a hockey player bet against [me]113-lager on this and lost [his]348-a hockey player hundred bucks . So , until twenty - four hours ago , [I]113-lager thought of [myself]113-lager as pretty darned tough .

And [I]113-lager ’ll need to be . The [Brooklyn Bruisers]183-the bruisers are closing in on the NHL playoffs for the first time in years . Once [[my]113-lager team]349-the hockey team makes the playoffs , a flood of tasks will head [my]113-lager way . Travel arrangements . Publicity events . Ticket sales in distant venues . As [the office manager]350-the office manager , it ’s [my]113-lager job to coordinate all this happy chaos .

But yesterday afternoon , in a moment of sheer stupidity , [I]113-lager walked out onto the gleaming ice of [the practice rink]351-the practice rink to deliver a message to one of [[my]113-lager coworkers]352-my coworkers .

For two years [I]113-lager ’d worked for [the hockey team]349-the hockey team without ever setting foot on the ice . But yesterday [I]113-lager thought … why not ? It ’s like working at [a fine restaurant]353-a fine restaurant and never sampling the food .

The why not became obvious about sixty seconds later , when [my]113-lager Chuck Taylor low tops slipped on the slick surface . [I]113-lager went down so fast that [I]113-lager could n’t even break [my]113-lager fall with [my]113-lager hands . Instead , [I]113-lager went down on one butt cheek . But that slipped , too ! [I]113-lager continued falling sideways , [my]113-lager arm and head hitting the ground next . [My]113-lager head actually bounced off the ice before [I]113-lager finally came to rest on the cold , cold surface .

Immediately , [I]113-lager did what [any self - respecting girl]354-any self - respecting girl does after [she]354-any self - respecting girl takes a serious tumble — [I]113-lager dusted [myself]113-lager off and told [the two coworkers who witnessed this ridiculousness that [I]113-lager was absolutely fine]355-the two coworkers who witnessed this ridiculousness that i was absolutely fine .

And [I]113-lager thought [I]113-lager was fine , unless [we]356-we were counting the bruise on [my]113-lager butt , which is the size of [the tri - state area]357-the tri - state area .

The concussion [I]113-lager sustained was n’t noticeable at first . [I]113-lager assumed that [my]113-lager disorientation was from sheer embarrassment . Feeling flushed and confused seemed perfectly rational at the time .

[I]113-lager went [home]358-home , ate some leftovers out of [my]113-lager refrigerator , and went to bed early . But at two in the morning [I]113-lager woke up again suddenly . [My]113-lager headache had escalated , and [I]113-lager felt a little sick . So [I]113-lager got up and went into [the bathroom]359-the room looking for some aspirin . And when [I]113-lager flipped on the light , [the room]359-the room spun . [I]113-lager grabbed the towel bar so hard that it came off the wall .

For the second time that day , [I]113-lager fell down on [my]113-lager ass .

The crash woke up [[my]113-lager sister]360-my sister in [the other bedroom]361-the other bedroom . When [she]360-my sister found [me]113-lager blinking on the floor , [she]360-my sister panicked . That ’s how [we]362-we ended up at the ER at [Brooklyn Methodist]3-brooklyn methodist in the middle of the night . If [I]113-lager think about the bill [they]363-they ’re going to send [me]113-lager , [I]113-lager ’ll probably get nauseous again . [They]363-they poked and prodded [me]113-lager in all the usual places , shining infernal lights in [my]113-lager eyes while [I]113-lager insisted [they]363-they should let [me]113-lager go [home]358-home .

[They]363-they finally did , but not before giving [me]113-lager lengthy instructions on how to recover from a concussion .

So here [I]113-lager roost — on [the world]365-the world ’s ugliest couch — in [[my]113-lager tiny , overcrowded apartment]366-my tiny , overcrowded apartment , wondering what the hell [I]113-lager ’m going to do . Meanwhile , tears of frustration are tracking down [my]113-lager face .

And [I]113-lager never cry . What the actual fuck ?

Okay , it hurts , dammit . But the headache is n’t what ’s got [me]113-lager so upset . [The ER doctor]367-the er doctor said [I]113-lager ca n’t go back to work for two weeks . [He]367-the er doctor told [me]113-lager to stay [home]358-home and avoid screens , paperwork , stress , and all physically and intellectually taxing situations .

Another tear glides down [my]113-lager face while [I]113-lager try to get [my]113-lager head around this . [I]113-lager ’ve just texted [Hugh Major]2070-hugh — [the General Manager of [the Brooklyn Bruisers]183-the bruisers]2070-hugh — to tell [him]2070-hugh [I]113-lager need a few days off . And [I]113-lager had to squint just to make the letters on the screen stop swimming around .

And two weeks ? That ’s just crazy talk . The timing is terrible , and [Hugh]2070-hugh will not be pleased . Nor will [Nate Kattenberger]1114-nate , [[the team]349-the hockey team ’s owner]369-the team ’s owner .

Furthermore , [I]113-lager ’m not okay with it . [[My]113-lager boys]370-my boys are on the cusp of making the playoffs for the first time since [I]113-lager came to work with [the team]349-the hockey team . [I]113-lager have to be there to see it . For two years [the hockey team]349-the hockey team has been [my]113-lager whole life . Sitting out for two weeks ? Impossible .

Powering down [my]113-lager phone , [I]113-lager take another shaky breath . [My]113-lager movements are stealthy because [[my]113-lager four - month - old nephew]371-my four - month - old nephew is asleep in a basket at [my]113-lager feet . [I]113-lager ca n’t wake [the baby]372-the baby . If [he]371-my four - month - old nephew starts crying right now , [my]113-lager head wo n’t be able to take it .

[I]113-lager focus on [his]371-my four - month - old nephew sleeping face and feel a little calmer , because [babies]373-babies know how to relax . [Matthew]88-matthew ’s dark eyelashes line [his]371-my four - month - old nephew chubby cheeks , and the blanket lifts gently with each quiet breath .

Yesterday [I]113-lager thought [my]113-lager biggest problem was sharing [an overcrowded apartment with [[my]113-lager sister]360-my sister and [[her]360-my sister family]376-her family]374-this apartment . Oh , and the fact that [I]113-lager have n’t had sex in eleven months and three days . That used to seem like a big problem .

But now [I]113-lager know better .

[Four people]377-four people live in [this apartment]374-this apartment , but [I]113-lager ’m the only one with a full - time job . [Fine]89-fine — [the baby]372-the baby is unemployable . But [two adults]379-two adults count on [me]113-lager , too . [[My]113-lager sister]360-my sister is trying to finish up [[her]360-my sister associate]380-her associate ’s degree , while working a few shifts as a barista . And [[her]360-my sister baby daddy]381-her baby daddy — [[our]382-our apartment]374-this apartment ’s fourth occupant — does construction work whenever [he]381-her baby daddy can get it . But often [he]381-her baby daddy ’s doing baby care instead .

That leaves [me]113-lager and [my]113-lager steady paycheck . And even though [[the team]368-the team ’s owner]369-the team ’s owner has known [me]113-lager for seven years , these last two years [I]113-lager ’ve worried about [my]113-lager job security . [My]113-lager absence today wo n’t help .

So what the hell am [I]113-lager going to do now ?

[I]113-lager must have said that out loud , because [[my]113-lager nephew]385-my nephew shifts in [his]385-my nephew sleep .

Ever since [Matthew]88-matthew came to live with [me]113-lager , [I]113-lager ’ve learned that [babies]373-babies have an uncanny knack for choosing the worst possible moment to wake up . [I]113-lager wipe [my]113-lager eyes with the heels of [my]113-lager hands and take a deep , calming breath .

[Matthew]88-matthew rolls over and grunts softly . [His]385-my nephew little mouth moves as if to suckle .

Uh - oh .

Slowly , [I]113-lager lean over the Moses basket , where [he]385-my nephew ’s sleeping , and fish the abandoned pacifier out of the blankets . Then , ever so stealthily , [I]113-lager slide the pacifier into [his]385-my nephew mouth . These are tricks [I]113-lager never thought [I]113-lager ’d learn . But then [[my]113-lager younger sister]387-my younger sister got pregnant at twenty - two . “ [I]387-my younger sister ’m keeping [the baby]372-the baby , ”[387-my younger sister] [she]387-my younger sister ’d announced immediately . “ And [Renny]90-renny is going to go work on an oil rig in [the Gulf]2345-the gulf to support [us]2346-us . ”[387-my younger sister]

Right .

Fast forward a few months , and [I]113-lager experience exactly zero surprise when [Missy]91-lauren loses [[her]91-lauren Queens apartment]388-her queens apartment for falling behind on the rent . And [I]113-lager experience only slightly more surprise when [Renny]90-renny lasts just a few months on the oil rig .

[He]385-my nephew came through [my]113-lager door a week ago , dropping to [his]385-my nephew knees on [my]113-lager rug in an overly dramatic gesture . “ [I]385-my nephew just could n’t stand another day without [[my]385-my nephew family]2347-my family ! ”[385-my nephew] [the twenty - one - year - old fool]389-the twenty - one - year - old fool cried . ( Yes , [[my]113-lager sister]360-my sister fell for [a younger man]391-a younger man . [I]113-lager ’d call [him]391-a younger man [[her]360-my sister child - groom]392-her child - groom , except [they]393-they are n’t even married . )

Now [we]394-we ’re all [one big happy family in [the tiny Brooklyn apartment]374-this apartment]395-one big happy family in the tiny brooklyn apartment [I]113-lager used to share only with [[my]113-lager best friend]397-my best friend [Georgia]95-georgia . [I]113-lager love [[my]113-lager sister]360-my sister , but [this apartment]374-this apartment really is n’t big enough for so much melodrama .

[I]113-lager ’ve been cast in the role of [Spinster Auntie]92-spinster auntie . And right now , behind the closed door of [the bedroom]398-the bedroom [[my]113-lager sister]360-my sister and [Renny]90-renny share , [I]113-lager can hear the hushed moans of [their]393-they lovemaking and the rhythmic thump of the headboard rocking against the wall .

[They]393-they think [they]393-they ’re so sneaky . Ever since [Renny]90-renny returned from [Texas]6-texas , [they]393-they slip off once a day for a quickie while [the baby]372-the baby naps . Any minute now [they]393-they ’ll emerge , flushed and happy , with [their]393-they soft - eyed glances for one another , [their]393-they hands lingering on each other ’s bodies , as if it would cause [them]393-they physical pain to let go of one another .

[[My]113-lager sister]360-my sister is kind of [an idiot]400-an idiot . Always has been . And yet [she]360-my sister snagged [a man who truly loves [her]360-my sister]401-a man who truly loves her . Every time [I]113-lager think about [them]393-they [I]113-lager want to throw up a little . And that was before [I]113-lager got a concussion .

At [my]113-lager feet , [Baby Matthew]88-matthew stretches [his]401-a man who truly loves her short , little arms over [his]401-a man who truly loves her bald , little head . [His]401-a man who truly loves her eyes are still screwed shut , but it wo n’t last . [The pacifier]402-the pacifier falls out again . Then [he]401-a man who truly loves her makes a breathy little complaint , and those blue eyes pop open .

No matter how shittastic [my]113-lager life is right now , one thing remains unshakably true : [[my]113-lager nephew]385-my nephew is completely adorable . “ [Hi]93-hi , ”[113-lager] [I]113-lager say softly , and [his]385-my nephew eyes find [me]113-lager . “ Did [you]385-my nephew have a good sleep ? ”[113-lager]

[He]385-my nephew considers the question .

“ Want to come hang out with [me]113-lager on the couch ? ”[113-lager] [I]113-lager lean over to fit [my]113-lager hands beneath [his]385-my nephew heavy warmth . [I]113-lager tug . And when [I]113-lager sit up again , [my]113-lager head gives a stab of pain so sharp [I]113-lager hiss with surprise .

The sound catches [Matthew]88-matthew off guard , and [he]385-my nephew whimpers .

“ [S’okay]94-s’okay , ”[113-lager] [I]113-lager say , [my]113-lager eyes closed against the pain . “ It ’s going to be fine . ”[113-lager]

It ’s unclear which of [us]404-us [I]113-lager ’m comforting .

2

[New York]12-new york , [NY]13-ny

5

8

Two Years Earlier

[Nate]1114-nate ’s kingdom grows into [an empire]889-an empire . Once again [[his]1114-nate castle]890-his castle has been upsized — [he]1114-nate now owns [the entire midtown office building]891-the entire midtown office building . [He]1114-nate has relocated [[his]1114-nate office]778-his office again — into [the penthouse C - suite]893-the penthouse c - suite . As [one]495-one does .

[Gone]185-gone is the Ping - Pong table . Gone are the jeans and the sneakers at work . ( Except on weekends . ) These days [[our]895-our prince]722-our prince must dress the part . [He]1114-nate wears a suit , even if [he]1114-nate rarely puts on a tie . [[His]1114-nate office]778-his office has floor - to - ceiling windows offering a sweeping view of [the East River]30-the east river and [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn .

Some things have n’t changed , though . [He]1114-nate takes [the ferry]784-the ferry to work each day , just like any commuter , because sitting in traffic is for suckers . And [he]1114-nate ’s still among [friends at work]898-friends at work , although [most of [them]898-friends at work]828-most of them are wearing suits , too .

But not [Rebecca]1114-nate . When [Nate]1114-nate peeks through [[his]1114-nate office]778-his office blinds to see [her]900-she at [her]900-she desk , [she]900-she always looks terrific and professional . But never boring . [She]900-she favors vintage skirts or brightly colored dresses . [She]900-she puts a unique stamp on everything [she]900-she touches . And [her]900-she smile still lights up [the room]359-the room .

It ’s a bright Tuesday in March , and [Nate]1114-nate has a meeting in exactly twelve minutes . [He]1114-nate sips [his]1114-nate excellent coffee and skims the technology headlines .

Meetings are the real drawback of being the head of [a Fortune 500 company]902-a fortune 500 company . [Our]903-our liege can no longer always shut the door to [[his]1114-nate office]778-his office and demand to be left alone . [KTech]186-ktech is so big now that the important decisions eat up about half of [his]1114-nate workweek . These days , when [he]1114-nate has a groundbreaking new idea , [he]1114-nate has to delegate the fun parts of it to [other people]760-other people .

It ’s a drag . It really is . But the paycheck is some comfort . With KTech phones for sale on six continents , the royal coffers now overfloweth with money . [Nate]1114-nate owns [an historic mansion in [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn]905-an historic mansion in brooklyn , [two cars]906-two cars , and [a private jet]907-a private jet . [He]1114-nate eats the best food that money can buy , and chooses wines without looking at the price tag .

“ [Nate]1114-nate . ”[1114-nate]

[He]1114-nate feels bad for fantasizing about [her]908-she . This began sometime after [Juliet]120-juliet left , and a while after [he]1114-nate had a long string of one - night stands trying to feel okay about the whole thing .

[She]908-she takes this in stride , disappearing from [[his]1114-nate office doorway]910-his office doorway without comment . A ten - minute delay is nothing . [He]1114-nate canceled the deal and has n’t done a cent of business with [that company]914-that company . And never will .

[Rebecca]1114-nate is under [his]1114-nate skin . [She]908-she ’s [a friend]815-a friend . [She]908-she ’s [[his]1114-nate right - hand man]916-his right - hand man . And now [she]908-she ’s [his]1114-nate unlikely crush .

27

Nate

June 10 , [[Brooklyn]589-brooklyn

[My]113-lager den]2102-brooklyn my den is dark as [I]113-lager enter [the room]675-this room . But the moment [I]113-lager walk in , soft lighting switches on .

“ Hullo , [Master Nate]1114-nate , ”[143-bingley] [Bingley]143-bingley says . “ Would [you]1114-nate like the television ? ”[143-bingley]

“ God , no . ”[143-bingley] Given the press conference debacle , [I]113-lager may never watch again . “ Pour [me]143-bingley a Scotch , would [you]1114-nate ? ”[143-bingley]

“ Sorry , [sir]1114-nate . [I]143-bingley have not the talent which [some people]3163-some people possess . That is beyond [my]143-bingley capabilities . ”[143-bingley]

“ [I]143-bingley know , [Bingley]143-bingley . Just wondered what [you]1114-nate ’d say . ”[143-bingley] Just another night in singlesville , joking with a bot . Party on . Good thing there ’s a hidden bar in the corner of [this room]675-this room . [I]113-lager open a walnut cabinet and take out a glass and a bottle of Macallan 18 . [I]113-lager pour [myself]113-lager two fingers of Scotch and kick off [my]113-lager shoes .

Then [I]113-lager sit down and take a sip . It burns going down .

[I]113-lager should n’t care what ’s written about [me]113-lager in some rag of a newspaper . Whether [we]2104-we win the Cup or not , [the hockey team]368-the team is a labor of love . [People]2391-people said [I]113-lager could n’t turn the franchise around . And yet [I]113-lager did exactly that with good management and great coaching . And [I]113-lager did it in two short years .

[They]368-the team were floundering before [I]113-lager bought [the team]368-the team . And now [they]368-the team ’re not . The end .

But the article stings . [Juliet]120-juliet left [me]113-lager for [an athlete]2107-an athlete , and [I]113-lager do n’t want [people]2391-people to read that and laugh .

[My]113-lager phone rings in [my]113-lager pocket — [[my]113-lager mother]716-my mother ’s ringtone . [I]113-lager ignore it . [She]716-my mother ’ll say nice things to [me]113-lager , but [I]113-lager do n’t want to hear [them]368-the team . But [she]716-my mother starts texting [me]113-lager anyway .

What just happened ? Do [you]2110-you think this is [Juliet]120-juliet ’s work ?

[I]113-lager doubt it , but [[my]113-lager mother]716-my mother never liked [her]716-my mother .

[I]113-lager ’m booking flights to [Dallas]571-dallas , [she]716-my mother says a moment later . [We]2111-we want to be there for [you]2110-you at game five .

[My]113-lager phone goes back into [my]113-lager pocket . [I]113-lager ’m too tired to engage . The couch beckons , and [I]113-lager lie back , resting [my]113-lager Scotch on [my]113-lager belly , like [Homer Simpson]324-homer simpson would do .

[[My]113-lager publicist]2112-my publicist — [Georgia]95-georgia — is miffed that [I]113-lager did n’t warn [her]716-my mother , too . [She]716-my mother called [me]113-lager while [I]113-lager was in [the car]2424-the car on [my]113-lager way [home]358-home . “ [I]716-my mother could have prevented that , ”[716-my mother] [she]716-my mother said . “ [You]113-lager need to let [me]716-my mother protect [you]113-lager . ”[716-my mother]

[New York]12-new york Wire

Sports Story of the Week

June 13 , 2020

Team Owner Gets First Stanley Cup , First Child in Three - Hour Window

“ Screaming is pretty common on [the maternity ward]3288-the maternity ward , ”[115-rebecca] Nurse Amalah Dawn of [[New York]12-new york Presbyterian [Brooklyn Methodist Hospital]80-brooklyn methodist hospital]79-new york presbyterian brooklyn methodist hospital told The Wire . “ But it ’s usually about childbirth , and not about hockey . ”[115-rebecca]

That changed last night , when [[Brooklyn]589-brooklyn Bruisers team owner [Rebecca Rowley Kattenberger]115-rebecca]2327-brooklyn bruisers team owner rebecca rowley kattenberger , 30 , watched [[her]115-rebecca players]2328-her players win [their]2328-her players first Stanley Cup since [[her]115-rebecca husband]2089-her husband — the tech mogul [Nate Kattenberger]1114-nate , 35 — first moved the franchise to [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn five years ago .

[Mrs. Kattenberger]167-mrs. kattenberger had planned to watch game six in [Nashville]81-nashville with [[her]167-mrs. kattenberger team]368-the team , but went into labor a few hours before [she]167-mrs. kattenberger ’d planned to fly down for the game .

“ [I]167-mrs. kattenberger thought — this is fine , it ’s not a disaster , ”[167-mrs. kattenberger] [Mrs. Kattenberger]167-mrs. kattenberger told [The Wire]340-the wire via email . “ If the series goes to game seven , [the baby]372-the baby and [I]167-mrs. kattenberger can make an appearance at [the Brooklyn arena]3290-the brooklyn arena . ”[167-mrs. kattenberger]

But that ’s not what happened . [She]167-mrs. kattenberger watched a very exciting game six on the labor and [delivery ward]2331-delivery ward , while [the medical team]368-the team monitored [her]167-mrs. kattenberger contractions .

“ Labor did not progress rapidly , ”[341-nurse dawn] [Nurse Dawn]341-nurse dawn reported . “ That ’s normal for a first birth . [The doctor]629-the doctor wanted to give [her]167-mrs. kattenberger an oxytocin drip to move things along , but [she]167-mrs. kattenberger said , ‘ Not until the third period . What if [we]3292-we go into overtime ? ’ ”[341-nurse dawn]

Ultimately [the team]368-the team and the labor process both got [their]368-the team respective jobs done . [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn broke a 2 - 2 tie with an early third period goal ( [Trevi]127-trevi , assisted by [Castro]1011-castro ) and followed it with another goal just ninety seconds later ( [Bayer]245-bayer , assisted by [Drake]342-drake ) . At the buzzer , [they]368-the team were [the official champions]2332-the official champions .

The reaction from birthing room # 407 was often loud and ultimately joyous .

“ During a tense part of the game , [we]3292-we reassured [nearby patients]3293-nearby patients that everything was just fine . And when [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn won , [everyone on [the ward]589-brooklyn]3294-everyone on the ward was pretty excited , ”[341-nurse dawn] [Dawn]341-nurse dawn said . “ [[Rebecca]115-rebecca ’s baby]372-the baby waited . Things went much faster after [we]3292-we shut off the television . [She]2333-a seven - pound baby girl was ready to push about two hours later , and [the baby]372-the baby was born an hour after that . ”[341-nurse dawn]

[Rebecca Rowley Kattenberger]115-rebecca and [Nathan Kattenberger]1114-nate welcomed [a seven - pound baby girl]2333-a seven - pound baby girl into [the world]365-the world at ten minutes past one in the morning . [Her]2333-a seven - pound baby girl name has been withheld from the press , but [the family]2335-the family is healthy and resting comfortably .

[The Kattenbergers]343-the kattenbergers live in [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn , where [they]2335-the family will raise [[their]2335-the family daughter]2336-their daughter . [Mrs. Kattenberger]167-mrs. kattenberger gave birth at [the [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn location of [the [New York]12-new york Presbyterian Hospital group]82-the new york presbyterian hospital group]2337-the brooklyn location of the new york presbyterian hospital group . [[Mrs. Kattenberger]167-mrs. kattenberger ’s [Brooklyn]589-brooklyn Bruisers Foundation]83-mrs. kattenberger ’s brooklyn bruisers foundation raised ten million dollars for the pediatric wing of [the hospital]943-the hospital just this past year . [[Her]2333-a seven - pound baby girl hockey players]2339-her hockey players also threw a holiday party on [the premises]1311-the premises in December .

Rumor has it that the Stanley Cup will make a visit to [the maternity ward]3288-the maternity ward before the weekend is through .

When asked if this was the most unusual birth [she]2333-a seven - pound baby girl ’s witnessed on shift , [Nurse Dawn]341-nurse dawn dismissed that idea . “ [We]3296-we had [a baby]717-a baby born in [the elevator]960-the elevator just last week . A ticker tape parade celebrating [the Bruisers]183-the bruisers ’ victory will be held on [Wall Street]84-wall street later this month , time and date to be announced next week . [Mr.]2342-mr. And [Mrs. Kattenberger]167-mrs. kattenberger plan to attend .
